title: Alienware Area-51m review: an upgradeable behemoth
description: Alienwares Area-51m isnt just a high-end gaming laptop with lots of power, although it definitely is that. Its a laptop that can be upgraded like a desktop, including both its CPU and GPU. The new Area-51m starts at around $1,950 and can be configured well north of $5,000. It is a behemoth that calls back to the time when all gaming laptops were thick, heavy computers that never left the comfort of a sturdy desk.
